price: (23) Other than Allāh, and guide them to the path of Hellfire
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهۡدُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi fa-ih'dūhum ilā ṣirāṭi al-jaḥīmi
